Jonathan Tennenbaum, The Crab Nebula and The Complex Domain, Executive Intelligence Review, p.24

"... it's time to liberate science from the prison of empiricism, and to unleash an era of Reason, an era of development of human creative powers unlike anything history has seen."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Unleash a New Era
